mean_cn: adj.压倒性的，势不可当的；巨大的
mean_en: very great or very strong; so powerful that you cannot resist it or decide how to react
sentence: The red team won an overwhelming victory against the blue team in the election.
sentence_trans: 红队在选举中战胜了蓝队，取得了压倒性的胜利。
word_etyma: over过度 + whelm压倒 + ing形容词后缀 → overwhelming势不可挡的，压倒的
